title: SED-PDS-Grunen & DKP-Criminal organizations?(2007)
description:
For english-only speaking:
This book is in german language. English title would be: SED (Socialistic unity party of Germany) / PDS (Party of democratic socialism) - The Green and DKP (German communist party) - Criminal organisations? (2007). Stasi agents, terrorists, documents fakery, criminal behaviour, assistance to murder... In this unique book you'll see the real face behind leftist political parties in Germany. Hiding behind cover of humanism are people with criminal backgrounds. Case after case you'll see how politics helps to build terrorist network (aka RAF) that terrorize the population, steals billions of DM and takes them to foreign countries, murdering political opponents and much more. Almost 100 politicians are analysed and exposed. 100 pages.
